page.title: 18ANNUAL FUN RUN
page.content:
Once a year{St.James' Church}holds a well supported Fun Run. Entrants come from a wide area and the course goes down the Main Street, along Castle Street, towards Balnamore turning at the crossroads and returns to Ballymoney via the road to Macfin and the old Coleraine Road , now called the Newbridge Road.
After the run ,in the church hall everyone is served light refreshments. Certificates are given to all who completed the run and prizes are awarded for the best times.
There are other runs in the area - the Dervock Half Marathon being one of the better known ones.
